Title: Lost in the Dark
Writer: Roberto Bracco (novel), Vittorio De Sica (screenplay), Camillo Mastrocinque (screenplay), Fulvio Palmieri (screenplay), Aldo Vergano (screenplay), Cesare Zavattini (screenplay)
Actors: Vittorio De Sica, Fiorella Betti, Jacqueline Plessis, Enrico Glori
Plot: Naples of the early twentieth century. A thug keeps a girl completely submissive and, having discovered that she is the daughter of a nobleman, tries to blackmail the father.
